reviewText:
Excellent movie  Thank you Tony Goss!  I am so proud to see my own horses  shadow and spirit ! taking part in the movie!
You really captured  the beauty on the farm !  Your mom stable has been part of my life for over 15years!  thank you again for making the movie
my family loves it !
This is a fun movie with a good story. Good for horse lovers. Nice scenery too. I like movies with a happy ending.

Poorly made movie, poor acting. Found it quite boring. There was no
rating on it - I would give it a PG-14 due to some language and
discussion on sexual orientation concerning animals. Could have been a
lot better but apparently the director thought this movie needed to
have some homosexual innuendo's added to it. Regret having wasted my
money on it. It is going in the garbage.

I was anticipating this movie so much. Couldn't find it in the stores, so I rented it from Amazon so my sister Bon Bon and I could watch it while we wait for it to show up in our local store.  We both cried when we heard Doug Goss aka the father sing a song for his daughter.  So beautiful and a great story. Love the fact that I got to see, in HD, the beautiful area I was raised and see people That I have known most of my life right there on the screen. Would watch it a hundred times again and have been telling everyone who will listen about this movie and that they MUST get a copy to watch with their families!!!
Great movie with fine actors! A+
Wonderful family movie with gorgeous scenery and filled with horses and other assorted farm animals. The little cairn terrier is a scene stealer.
Excellent movie! Beautiful scenery and animals! The way life should be!
Our daughter loves this.  Good family movie.
Was Cute however got very boring and lost but always like a happy ending
thanks
Bad acting and a cheaply made movie!
quality sucked
Wonderful, fun movie!
TERRIBLE.... save your money. We usually love the warm fuzzy country kind of movies, could not finish this
Very good  movie. I would recommend it for  familiy viewing.
Great!!  Very entertaining!

The absolutely worse movie I have watched with my 13-yr. old daughter!  We skipped through lots of inappropriate sections.  What was left was still a very poor movie.  I agree with the first reviewer, if I owned this movie I wouldn't hesitate a second before throwing it in the trash.  My daughter agrees with me this, too!  Don't waste your money or your time watching this movie.
I Bought it and was disappointed. It looked like it was made by an amateur. Very poor story and production.
Good western movie. Love the horses.
GOOD MOVIE
This looks like a family movie but has many questionable topics. Not what you would expect
Great movie for entire family
Didn't like. It look to fake.
good movie
ok
great family movie enjoyed it
A good movie..everyone will enjoy it.
